mapper.update: update USERINFO set USNAME = #{usname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USPWD = #{uspwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USSEX = #{ussex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USBRITHDAY = #{usbrithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USEMAIL = #{usemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USPHONE = #{usphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USMOBILE = #{usmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USQQ = #{usqq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USIMG = #{usimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USVISITDATE = #{usvisitdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USSTATE = #{usstate,jdbcType=CHAR} where USID = #{usid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select USID, USNAME, USPWD, USSEX, USBRITHDAY, USEMAIL, USPHONE, USMOBILE, USQQ, USIMG, USVISITDATE, USSTATE from USERINFO where USID = #{usid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select USID, USNAME, USPWD, USSEX, USBRITHDAY, USEMAIL, USPHONE, USMOBILE, USQQ, USIMG, USVISITDATE, USSTATE from USERINFO
